page.title: 11AMBULANCE STATION
page.content: The{Ambulance Station},situated on Leicester Rd,is open 24 hrs a day.It is positioned here because of the Dunstable Road and M1 situated nearby.This ambulance station has 9 front line ambulances that are fully equiped every time.The overall leader of the stations is the{Area Commander} who also has an assistant.At the station itself there are 5 leading ambulance men in charge.The station was built 30 years ago,but was not officially opened by anyone.Apart from the Motorway and Dunstable Road,the station treats accidents on the railway,Luton Airport,and other places.The{Police}also help at the ambulance station when there are accidents. Sanjib Roy Form 2/1 Challney Boys School
